en: Farm family in field with a McCormick binder in Washington County, Tennessee

This photograph is titled, "Farm family in the field with a McCormick binder in Washington County, Tennessee". Eleven individuals pose in a field with a horse-drawn McMormick binder.  Three of the men hold dogs, and all five women have removed their bonnets.  The picture was taken in Washington County, Tennessee.  The McCormick binder was used for harvesting grain.
Era 7 - The Emergence of Modern America (1890-1930)
